name: Widow Style 2.1
description:
This is a Style which brings out a morbid Widow aesthetic. Simply call Style-Widow_SD2 in your prompt and your female characters will be ready for mourning, Victorian widow's weeds style!

If you'd like the effect to come through stronger (some models need it), try bumping up the emphasis on Style-Widow_SD2 - or adding it into your prompt multiple times.

Please consider joining my Patreon! I have a comprehensive tutorial on how this, and my other popular TI embeddings are created! Happy to share my SD knowledge, through advanced tutorials. Also news, settings explanations, adult-art, from a female content creator (me!) patreon.com/theally
